name: chai-jscodeshift
description: Chai assertion utilities for writing JSCodeShift Codemods.

10.2.0.name: chai-jscodeshift
10.2.0.description: Chai assertion utilities for writing JSCodeShift Codemods.

scripts.test:cover: NODE_PATH=$NODE_PATH:./test ../../node_modules/.bin/babel-node ../../node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --reporter text --reporter html ../../node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --reporter spec test/**/*.test.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:lib
